channel.title: Life on Trenton Broughton
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Trenton Broughton

item.title: Handy Sale Advertisement Guide.
Black Friday.
item.description: Black Friday means something quite different to me. See, three years ago on Black Friday, i was mugged. Not a “Hey you, give me your wallet” kind of mugging, but more of the “We’ll just smash your face and not ask” kind. i woke up in the hospital without any memory of what happened (in fact, i lost several hours worth of memories). i went through two surgeries, and had my jaw wired shut for a couple of months, but it could have been a lot worse – especially for my family.
